cards.title: Pyre
powers: 1 player draws a card. {Rad} that card until it leaves their hand. Shuffle a cascade card from your trash into your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may discard an {Rad} card to draw a card, play a card, and use a power now.
One hero target deals each target 1 energy damage.
One player may discard 2 cards, then draw 2 cards.

openingLines.default: This suit isn't for my protection... It's for all of yours.
openingLines.Cauldron.GrayCharacter: Okay, is this some weird time travel stuff again? Where I have to help my past self solve his problems?
openingLines.PastTheRamCharacter: I don't think Alistair will begrudge me a little violence against his upstart of an ancestor.

cards.title: Atmosphere Scrubbers
cards.body: When this card enters play, you may use a power.
powers: 2 heroes may each discard a card to regain 2 HP. Each hero who discards an {Rad} card this way may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: It's better than{BR}nothing, but you're still probably{BR}going to kill us all.

cards.flavorReference: Doc Havoc, Two If By Night #1

cards.title: Atomic Punch
body: Select 2 non-{Rad} cards in 1 player's hand. {Rad} those cards until they leave that player's hand. If 2 of your cards were {Rad} this way, increase energy damage dealt by {Pyre} by 1 until the end of your turn.
{Pyre} deals 1 target 2 energy damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Once upon a time we{BR}might have done business.

cards.title: Cellular Irradiation
body: Select a hero. They activate each of the following in order if they have at least that many {Rad} cards in their hand:
{ 1: Use a power.
{ 2: Draw a card.
{ 3: Deal themselves 2 energy damage.
{ 4: Play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: I haven't lied to you yet.{BR}I mean, today.

cards.title: Cherenkov Drive
body: At the end of your turn, 1 player may select 1 non-{Rad} card in their hand. {Rad} that card until it leaves their hand. Then, they may use a power on that card.
If that power destroys that card, discard it instead.

flavorQuotes.text: Sure, the technology{BR}exists. But without an energy{BR}source to power it...

cards.title: Chromodynamics
cards.body: Whenever a player plays an {Rad} card, {Pyre} deals 1 target 1 energy damage.
powers: Discard a card. {Pyre} deals 2 targets 2 lightning damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: ...and if the only way to{BR}stabilize him is to remove this{BR}power, will he accept it?

cards.title: Containment Breach
cards.body: Whenever a player plays an {Rad} card, increase energy damage dealt by {Pyre} by 1 until the end of your turn. Then shuffle a Cascade card from your trash into your deck.
powers: {Pyre} deals himself and each non-hero target 1 energy damage.

flavorQuotes.text: No more limits, or warnings.{BR}Let's have a little insanity.

cards.flavorReference: Pyre, The Atomic Pyre: Ash, Rain, and Snow

cards.title: Fission Regulator
cards.body: When Rogue Fission Cascade would enter play, instead discard it and draw a card. Then put a Cascade card from your trash on top of your deck and destroy this card.
powers: Each player selects 1 non-{Rad} card in their hand. {Rad} those cards until they leave their hands.
cards.flavorText: “Destruction without{BR}profit has no appeal,” said Gray.{BR}Vanish narrowed her eyes. “I'll{BR}pretend that was a 'thank you'.”

cards.title: Fractured Control Rod
body: If this card is {Rad} when you play it, {Pyre} deals 1 target 3 toxic damage.
Whenever a player discards an {Rad} card, they may destroy this card to play the discarded card.

flavorQuotes.text: Yes, keep trying to break{BR}this shell. I don't think you understand{BR}what happens when you succeed.

cards.title: Gamma Burst
body: Select up to 2 non-{Rad} cards in 1 player's hand. {Rad} those cards until they leave that player's hand.
{Pyre} deals that hero and each non-hero target X energy damage, where X is the number of cards {Rad} this way.

cards.title: Half-life
body: Search your deck for an equipment card and put it into your hand. {Rad} that card until it leaves your hand. Shuffle your deck.
You may play an equipment card.
{Pyre} deals each non-hero target 0 energy damage.

flavorQuotes.text: If you don't want the last{BR}thing you see to be a very bright light,{BR}you'll hurry up and find a solution.

cards.title: Hull Cladding
body: Reduce damage dealt to and by {Pyre} by 1.
If Containment Breach is ever in play, destroy it or destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Give me some credit. My R&D{BR}division was [b]VERY[/b] well-funded.

cards.title: Ion Trace
body: Two players may each select a non-{Rad} card in their hand and move a card that shares a keyword with it from their trash to their hand. {Rad} any cards selected or moved this way until they leave their hands.
{Pyre} deals each non-hero target 0 energy damage.
cards.flavorText: The suit helped to drown{BR}out the constant scratching in his{BR}mind, allowing him to focus on the{BR}lingering energy signature.

cards.title: Neutron Forcefield
cards.body: If this card is {Rad} when you play it, it becomes indestructible until the end of your turn.
powers: Select a hero target. Until the start of your next turn, that target is immune to damage. Destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: I apologize for our{BR}last encounter. I'm glad to{BR}see you survived after all.

cards.title: Particle Collider
powers: 1 player may play an {Rad} card now. {Pyre} deals 1 target 1 energy damage. You may destroy a copy of Thermonuclear Core. If you do, increase this damage by 3.

flavorQuotes.text: It amuses me greatly,{BR}watching you try to cope with this{BR}power. Watching you realize its scope.

cards.title: Rogue Fission Cascade
body: When this card enters your hand, put it into play.
{Pyre} deals each hero with {Rad} cards in their hand X energy damage, where X is the number of {Rad} cards in all hands.
Reveal the top card of your deck and draw or discard it.
cards.flavorReference: Vanish, The Atomic Pyre: Ash, Rain, and Snow

cards.title: Thermonuclear Core
body: When this card enters your hand, select 1 non-{Rad} card in your hand. {Rad} that card until it leaves your hand.
At the end of your turn, 1 player with no {Rad} cards in their hand draws a card. {Rad} that card until it leaves their hand.

flavorQuotes.text: The deal is off. I have{BR}what I needed.

cards.title: Irradiated
cards.body: The card this is next to is irradiated.

promoCards.title: Pyre
powers: {Rad} 1 non-{Rad} card in a player's hand until it leaves their hand. Play an equipment card. Shuffle a cascade card from your trash into your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may discard an {Rad} card. If they do, 1 target regains 4 HP.
Select a target. That target is immune to damage during the next environment turn.
One player may draw a card now.

openingLines.default: Just like old times. Let's turn up the heat!
openingLines.Cauldron.GrayCharacter: I wish I knew. Let's just pretend I'm your conscience, here to make myself heard through all that radiation.

promoCards.title: Pyre
powers: The next time {Pyre} would deal damage to a hero target, you may redirect it to another target. Draw 2 cards. Discard a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may discard an {Rad} card. If they do, they deal 3 targets 3 energy damage each.
One hero may deal themselves 2 energy damage and play 2 cards.

openingLines.default: Radiation output levels are safe. But you're not.
openingLines.Cauldron.GrayCharacter: Something like that. You make it sound worse than it is.

promoCards.title: Pyre
powers: Select 3 non-{Rad} cards among all players' hands and {Rad} them until they leave those players' hands.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may discard an {Rad} card. If they do, each player may play a card now.
One player may draw a card now.

openingLines.default: Let's see how this makeshift containment suit holds up.
openingLines.Cauldron.GrayCharacter: Well, I'm you from the future, so trust me when I say, that's not going to happen today.
